name: Narrative Reframing for Survivors
description: Empowering survivors to rewrite their personal narratives by breaking free from the implanted beliefs and distortions imposed through ritual abuse.

cards.title: Recognizing Implanted False Narratives
cards.description: Identifying the subconscious belief systems forced onto survivors through repeated psychological reinforcement.
bulletpoints: Distinguishing between authentic self-perception and trauma-imposed identities.
Identifying keywords, phrases, and triggers used in mental conditioning.
Detecting and dismantling self-sabotaging thought patterns installed through manipulation.

cards.title: Rewriting Internalized Conditioning
cards.description: Using cognitive restructuring techniques to replace trauma-based programming with self-directed beliefs.
bulletpoints: Utilizing journaling exercises to reconstruct personal truth.
Applying symbolic language to overwrite destructive subconscious imprints.
Developing new self-definitions that reject past imposed roles.

cards.title: Creating a Future Unshackled by the Past
cards.description: Techniques for moving forward without the weight of ritualistic programming dictating behavior.
bulletpoints: Visualizing a self-defined future untainted by past manipulation.
Using emotional reprogramming to detach from past trauma cycles.
Building resilience against potential triggers and residual mental conditioning.
